name: cardify-monorepo
description: Cardify - Application complète de cartes de visite numériques

scripts.build:backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend: No build required'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && echo 'Frontend: No tests configured'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.audit: npm run audit:backend && npm run audit:frontend
scripts.outdated: npm run outdated:backend && npm run outdated:frontend

author: Shaya Coca
